item.title: Swift Cheat Sheet for Dates, Formatters, & Date Components
item.description: Working with NSDate, NSDateFormatter, and NSDateComponents can be a little convoluted, so I’ve created myself a cheat sheet that will be updated as I discover new tips and tricks in this realm. The new cheat sheet can be found over at GitHub in the form of an Xcode Playground: Resources Swift Dates Cheat Sheet Playground Topics that are included in the Playground are as follows:
